heading: About Deborah
bio1: Deborah Lyon is a highly experienced lymphatic specialist based in Bridge of Allan, Scotland. With extensive training in Manual Lymphatic Drainage (MLD) and post-operative care, she provides expert therapeutic treatments for a wide range of conditions.
bio2: Her practice specializes in lymphoedema management, post-surgical recovery, and wellness treatments. Deborah is committed to providing personalized care tailored to each client's unique needs, using evidence-based techniques to achieve the best possible outcomes.
bio3: As a member of leading professional organizations including MLD UK, the Lymphoedema Training Academy, and the British Lymphology Society, Deborah maintains the highest standards of professional practice and continues to advance her expertise through ongoing education.
